source_audits.description: Analyzed 27 citations where GPT-5-mini made errors
source_audits.notes: Found 9 GT errors: citations marked VALID that should be INVALID

source_audits.description: Audited 94 citations model got correct to verify GT labels
source_audits.notes: Manual audit found 3 GT errors: citations marked INVALID that should be VALID

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Plato (1989). _Symposium_ (A. Nehamas & P. Woodruff, Trans.). Hackett Publishing Company.
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Citation is correctly formatted per APA 7. Translation properly credited.

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Plato (1989). _Symposium_ (A. Nehamas & P. Woodruff, Trans.). Hackett Publishing Co. (Original work published 385-378 BCE)
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Citation is correctly formatted per APA 7. Translation and original work publication date properly noted.

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Jerrentrup, A., Mueller, T., Glowalla, U., Herder, M., & Henrichs, N. (2018). Teaching medicine with the help of Dr. House. PLoS ONE, 13(3), Article e0193972. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0193972
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Synthetic change removed 2 authors correctly per APA 7 rules. Citation remains valid despite missing italics/quotation marks.

ground_truth_corrections.citation: David, A., Simpson, J., & Lee, C. (Eds.). (2006). _The Norton Anthology of English Literature: The Middle Ages_ (8th ed., Vol. A). W. W. Norton & Company.
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Added editor 'Lee, C.' to synthetic variant - model correctly identified as different from valid seed

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Joly, J. F., Stapel, D. A., & Lindenberg, S. M. (2008). Silence and table manners: When environments activate norms. _Personality and Social Psychology Bulletin_, _34_(8), 1047–1056. https://doi.org/10.1177/0146167208318401(Retraction published 2012, _Personality and Social Psychology Bulletin, 38_[10], 1378)
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Retraction note has formatting issues with parentheses placement

ground_truth_corrections.citation: U.S. Department of the Interior. (2020, January 10). _Like frosting on a cake, snow coats and clings to the hoodoos at Bryce Canyon National Park in Utah_ [Image attached] [Status update]. Facebook. Retrieved from https://www.facebook.com/USInterior/photos/a.155163054537384/2586475451406120/?type=3&theater
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Uses 'Retrieved from' which was removed in APA 7 for most cases

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Smith, J. A., Baniya, S., & Weech, S. (2019). _Data and experience design: Negotiating community-oriented digital research with service-learning_. _Purdue Journal of Service-Learning and International Engagement, 6_(1), 11–16. https://doi.org/10.5703/1288284316979
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Article title incorrectly italicized (should not be italicized)

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Schulman, M. (2019, September 9). _Superfans: A love story_. _The New Yorker_. https://doi.org/10.1000/xyz456
Harris, K. R., Graham, S., & Urdan T. (Eds.). (2012). _APA educational psychology handbook_ (Vols. 1–3). American Psychological Association.
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Missing comma after author initial: 'Urdan T.' should be 'Urdan, T.'

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Ganster, D. C., Schaubroeck, J., Sime, W. E., & Mayes, B. T. (1991). The Nomological Validity of the Type A Personality Among Employed Adults [Monograph]. _Journal of Applied Psychology_, _76_(1), 143–168. https://doi.org/10.1037/0021-9010.76.1.143
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Article title uses title case instead of sentence case: 'The Nomological Validity...'

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Pope, J. P., & Wall, H. (2025). _Is the goal intrinsic or extrinsic? Examining self-determination theory researchers’ and the general publics’ perceptions of exercise goals._ _Canadian Journal of Behavioural Science/Revue canadienne des sciences du comportement_, _57_(3), 239–248. https://doi.org/10.1037/cbs0000411
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Extra period before closing italic underscore in title

ground_truth_corrections.citation: Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry. (n.d.). _Asbestos in your environment: What you can do to limit exposure_ [Fact sheet]. U.S. Department of Health & Human Services. doi:10.1234/atsdr.5678
ground_truth_corrections.reason: Uses 'doi:' format instead of 'https://doi.org/' AND has '&' in organization name (should be 'and')

key_findings: Found 12 total GT errors across both audits
9 GT errors were in citations model got WRONG (marked VALID, should be INVALID)
3 GT errors were in citations model got RIGHT (marked INVALID, should be VALID)
Most GT errors involve subtle APA 7 formatting violations
Model was often correct when GT was wrong
